title: Unemployment rate in Scotland 2000 to 2019
summary: Overall Unemployment rate has decreased over the Year.
Unemployment rate is slightly decreasing from 2016 to 2019.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Unemployment rate, of value 5.2 was reached at Year 2016
The lowest Unemployment rate, of value 3.6 was reported at Year 2019
min_summary: In general Unemployment rate has fallen over the Year.
Unemployment rate is slightly decreasing from 2016 to 2019.
